mapper.sql: id, quantity, category_type, category_id, name, subtitle, process, main_image, favor, status, product_selected
mapper.insert: insert into mall_cart_product (id, quantity, category_type, category_id, name, subtitle, process, main_image, favor, status, product_selected) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{favor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productSelected,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update mall_cart_product
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
category_type = #{categoryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
process = #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_image = #{mainImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
favor = #{favor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_selected = #{productSelected,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mall_cart_product set quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_type = #{categoryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process = #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_image = #{mainImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, favor = #{favor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_selected = #{productSelected,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select category_id, count(category_id) from mall_cart_product group by category_id having count(category_id) = (select max(counts) from (select category_id, count(1) AS counts from mall_cart_product group by category_id) as temp) limit 1
